Literature.Title: Self-assembly to function: design, synthesis, and broad spectrum antimicrobial properties of short hybrid E-vinylogous lipopeptides
Literature.Author: Shankar SS, Benke SN, Nagendra N, Srivastava PL, Thulasiram HV, Gopi HN

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli NCIM 2065(MIC=>100µg/ml),Escherichia coli K-12(MIC=>100µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae NCIM 2957(MIC=>100µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa NCIM 5029(MIC=>100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus NCIM 5021(MIC=>100µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium NCIM 2501(MIC=>100µg/ml),Candida albicans NCIM 3471(MIC=>100µg/ml),Candida glabrata NCIM 3237(MIC=50µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans NCIM 3542(MIC=>100µg/ml),Saccharomyces cerevisiae NCIM 3454(MIC=>100µg/ml)
